TEXT.BODY: Shr profit 17 cts vs profit 14 cts Net profit 1.3 mln vs profit 901,000 Revs 36.9 mln vs 36.2 mln Six months Shr profit 18 cts vs loss 11 cts Net profit 1.4 mln vs loss 716,000 Revs 63.6 mln vs 57.7 mln NOTE:1986 six months includes increase in provision for doubtful accounts to 1.5 mln dlrs. 1986 shares give effect to issuance of 1.5 mln shares in exchange for outstanding Series 1 preferred shares.
